member.name: ITfCompartmentEventSink.OnChange
member.param: Contains a GUID that identifies the compartment that changed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfCompartmentEventSink
member.summary: The ITfCompartmentEventSink interface is implemented by a client (application or text service) and used by the TSF manager to notify the client when compartment data changes. This notification sink is installed by obtaining an interface from the object and calling with IID_ITfCompartmentEventSink and a pointer to the ITfCompartmentEventSink object.
